Interim order asserts government is a caretaker one and terms induction of new ministers earlier this month, after prime minister lost a confidence vote, unconstitutional. https://t.co/yvmtZlot8N — by @tikapradhan

EDITORIAL: Washed out

Officials still make it a point to begin work at the last minute in the thick of the monsoon.

https://t.co/G25uBBGRtM

Nepal resuming and adding more flights to labour destination countries

The decision will bring relief to thousands of Nepali migrant workers stuck at home and abroad, as well as help in the repatriation of bodies of Nepali workers. https://t.co/wvD73vAZj6 — by @CK_Mandal

Admission campaigns begin in Karnali schools

The majority of schools in the province have launched admission campaigns after publishing results of the last academic session based on internal evaluation.
https://t.co/4p7dd8B9Fq — by Chandani Kathayat
